## ScaleDropdownProps.type property

If a data type is catgorical only (e.g., strings), filter to only include the nomincal scales. Likewise, if the data is numeric in nature, filter to only include categorical scales.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type?: 'nominal' | 'continuous';
```
